accounts.description: Specifies the list of accounts a report covers.

frameworkArns.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the frameworks a report covers.

numberOfFrameworks.description: Specifies the number of frameworks a report covers.

organizationUnits.description: Specifies the list of Organizational Units a report covers.

regions.description: Specifies the list of regions a report covers.

reportTemplate.description: Identifies the report template for the report. Reports are built using a report template. The report templates are: `RESOURCE_COMPLIANCE_REPORT` | `CONTROL_COMPLIANCE_REPORT` | `BACKUP_JOB_REPORT` | `COPY_JOB_REPORT` | `RESTORE_JOB_REPORT`.
